testcase.name: user should Regiter
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user clicks on singup..................................................passed And user enter Firstname "qwe1" and Lastname "asd1".........................passed And user enter Mail "qwe1@asd.com" and User "qwe1"..........................passed And user enter Password "qwe1" and ConfPasswd "qwe1"........................passed And click on register button................................................passed Then user should view confirmation message "Dear qwe1 asd1, Your personal settings have been registered.".passed And click on user dropdown..................................................passed Then validate the user "qwe1 asd1" and mail "qwe1@asd.com"..................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: user sends an email
testcase.system-out:
Given user logins and click on compose button...............................passed When user enter Id "qwe@asd.com"............................................passed And user enter Subject "Hi for Testing" and Desc "Hello qwe, 
 \t This is for Testing, 

 From 
 qwe ".passed And click on send...........................................................passed Then validate the acknowledgement "The message has been sent to qwe asd (qwe)".passed
